content.text: Match ends, Hércules 2, Xerez 2.
Second Half ends, Hércules 2, Xerez 2.
Attempt missed. Carlos Calvo (Hércules) right footed shot from a difficult angle and long range on the left is close, but misses the top right corner from a direct free kick.
Calahorro (Xerez) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Felipe (Hércules) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Calahorro (Xerez).
Corner,  Xerez. Conceded by Juan Carlos Martín.
Attempt saved. Bruno Herrero (Xerez) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Iñigo Vélez.
Attempt missed. Iñigo Vélez (Xerez) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Capi with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Xerez. Conceded by Juan Carlos Martín.
Attempt saved. Capi (Xerez) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Francisco Maldonado.
Attempt blocked. Felipe (Hércules) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Gilvan Esquerdinha with a cross.
Attempt saved. Francisco Maldonado (Xerez) right footed shot from more than 35 yards is saved in the centre of the goal.
Corner,  Hércules. Conceded by Toni Doblas.
Attempt saved. Urko Vera (Hércules) left footed shot from the left side of the six yard box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Felipe.
Toni Doblas (Xerez) is shown the yellow card.
Attempt missed. Carlos Calvo (Hércules) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left.
Attempt blocked. Gilvan Esquerdinha (Hércules) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the right is blocked.
Offside, Hércules. Míchel tries a through ball, but Urko Vera is caught offside.
Attempt blocked. Gilvan Esquerdinha (Hércules) left footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Felipe.
Attempt missed. Jesús Mendoza (Xerez) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Capi following a corner.
Corner,  Xerez. Conceded by Samuel.
Attempt blocked. Capi (Xerez) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Francisco Maldonado.
Foul by Francisco Maldonado (Xerez).
Anaitz Arbilla (Hércules) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Substitution, Xerez. Iñigo Vélez replaces José Mari.
Attempt missed. Jesús Mendoza (Xerez) left footed shot from the left side of the box is too high. Assisted by Pablo Redondo with a cross.
Francisco Maldonado (Xerez) hits the left post with a header from the centre of the box. Assisted by Alejandro Campano with a cross.
Substitution, Hércules. Felipe replaces Diego Rivas.
Samuel (Hércules) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
José Mari (Xerez) wins a free kick on the right wing.

Pablo Redondo (Xerez) is shown the yellow card for hand ball.
Hand ball by Pablo Redondo (Xerez).
Attempt missed. José Mari (Xerez) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Alejandro Campano.

Foul by Diego Rivas (Hércules).
Bruno Herrero (Xerez) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Carlos Calvo (Hércules).
Attempt missed. Urko Vera (Hércules) header from the centre of the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Gilvan Esquerdinha with a cross following a corner.
Substitution, Hércules. Carlos Calvo replaces Adrián Sardinero.

Foul by Sergio Díaz (Hércules).

Second Half begins Hércules 2, Xerez 1.
